properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm; Coastal waters from NC VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 3:17PM EST until January 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 20 knots, increasing to 20 to 25 knots
with gusts to 30 knots Saturday night. Winds may may
occasionally gust to 35 knots, especially out 20 nm. Seas 4 to 5
feet Saturday afternoon, building to 5 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-
North Carolina border out to 20 nm and Coastal waters from NC
VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 7 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY
